column8: GEORGE TOWN: Two DAP MPs have been summoned by the police to give their statements at the police district headquarters here.Both Batu Kawan MP Kasthuriraani Patto and Bukit Mertajam MP Steven Sim were said to have received a notice earlier informing them to show up at the headquarters.Kasthuriraani, who was accompanied by her lawyer R.S.N. Rayer, was quizzed by police for about 90 minutes.She went into the headquarters at 10.15am on Wednesday.Rayer said Kasthuriraani was giving her statement over a forum at the Caring Society Complex on April 12 last year where she was a panellist.“We were told they would be investigated under the Peaceful Assembly Act 2012.“It is related to the forum last year,” he said when contacted.It is learnt that Sim is due to turn up with his lawyer Ramkarpal Singh at the district headquarters later.Read more at http://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2017...ql155o5qXomc.99
